data: Brad A Fobar Brad A Fobar Instructor Brad.Fobar@nau.edu Phone: 928-523-9468 19-302 I am interested in large classroom pedagogy and utilizing active learning and other new methods to improve student success in introductory physics classes. Since I like to apply my physics and teaching skills outside of the classroom, I am also a PSIA certified ski instructor. MS in Applied Physics, Northern Arizona University BS in Astronomy and Physics, University of Arizona
